name: Off Road Oil Transport - Truck trailer Driving 3D
name_original: Off Road Oil Transport - Truck trailer Driving 3D
description:
Are you interested in driving of heavy duty truck trailer oil tanker? Here is your opportunity to have fun and thrill of driving of a heavy duty oil tanker with extreme powerful engine of 4x4 and 6x6 truck trailer oil tanker offroads with the help of oil tanker driving truck game. Have the real transport of oil cargo truck driving and face the offroad mountain traffic. This simulation game is a perfect chance for playing off road transport truck games with heavy truck driving duty. This sim game presents ultimate challenge to them. The Oil Tanker Fuel Transport also provides full fun of tanker parking and driving simulator. You are advised to play Oil Tanker Fuel Transport simulator for achieving actual environment of oil trucking & heavy duty trailer on off road tracks. Your duty as a truck driver is to supply oil to the gas and oil stations in the city and off-road.

Your duty as an fuel tanker driver is to transport oil to gas station as well as to offroad fuel delivery stations. You can test your skills to drive and control heavy 4x4 and 6x6 trucks trailer & tankers. Your primary duty is to maintain fuel supply to the city fuel stations so that there may not be any deficiency of oil. The city transport e.g. buses, 4X4 cars, 6X6 trucks, 4X4 jeeps etc totally depend upon your provider of fuel to the oil stations. Army trucks, law enforcement agencies’ vehicles, common citizens, bikers, owners of 4X4 and 6X6 vehicles and other movement in the city and offroad areas are dependent upon your skills to drive and supply oil

Following are the feature of Off Road Oil Transport Truck 1:
- New off road 4x4 and 6x6 truck trailer in the game.
- New and beautiful environment and graphics.
- Real driving Environment and skills.
- New models of trucks.
- Real sound of heavy truck trailer.
- More fun than before.

Please drop your valuable comments for our betterment. Play and have fun!!!
